name: DI(C)E (Low Effort Jam #17)
description:
Roll the die, BE the die!

DI(C)E is a turn-based local multiplayer strategy game for two players and was created participating Low Effort Jam 17.

Controls
  • Die 1: WASD
  • Die 2: Arrow Keys
  • Exit to Main Menu: ESC

Note:

  • you need to click into the game window once to activate keyboard controls

This game was created using the Godot Engine. License information can be found at https://godotengine.org/license.
